reviews: this is very soft and super comfortable glad i saw this for summers fits as expected good quality little bit pricey they are just amazing a little bit more expensive for my liking but the fit and quality lives upto it the shorts are fine although it mentions 92 cotton but it does not feel much like cotton feels more like spandex the side bottom protrudes like a nose and hence the shape is a little wierd its comfortable but looks just ok after wearing like quality wise product is really nice but the issue is with the size i have ordered m as it fits me but m for this product is quite large and it is little bit large\n\nbut rather than this you can go for this it is nice product color is also fine i expected these to be of thicker less stretchy fabric since theyre like board shorts the fabric is soft good quality and not flimsy but its very stretchy the kind that clings so panty lines bulges and contours definitely show the waistband is very wide and of good quality but i think these shorts are overpriced for what they are they arent supportive and smoothing like tights of this material would be but they arent relaxed fit like shorts not sure what they were going for yoga pants only shorts and looser the cloth is really nice its 92 cotton the pockets have chain which help your stuff to be intact it fits perfectly its about knee length as shown in picture its just that the colour is a little dull as its jet black i have kept it still as its worth having got it for ‚Çπ649
